# eigen

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of eigen is to calculate eigenvectors from eigenvalues

## Installation

You can install the released version of eigen from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("eigen")
```
